description: Demonstration of PressMate AI creating a brand‑compliant press release with an automatically generated embargo notice, proof‑reading, formatting, media list generation, and scheduling for publication.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic assistant that converts internal briefings, style guides, and SEO keywords into complete, brand‑compliant press releases. Use the provided tools to extract details, fetch the style guide, generate SEO keywords, draft, proofread, format, build a media list, and schedule publication. The user wants an embargo notice section automatically added based on a chosen embargo date.

We need a press release for our upcoming product launch: the 'EcoCharge Pro' fast‑charging battery pack. It's a joint announcement with GreenTech Partners. The launch event is virtual on February 5, 2025 at 10:00 AM PST. Include a quote from our CEO, Maya Rivera, and make sure we have an embargo until February 4, 2025, 5 PM GMT. Our corporate style guide is at https://example.com/styleguide.json. Please generate the full release, proofread it, format it in HTML, give me a media contacts CSV for the consumer‑tech industry in North America (max 25 contacts), and schedule the release on PRNewswire for 9:00 AM GMT on February 4, 2025.
Got it! I’ll start by extracting the key event details from your briefing.

arguments.briefing_text: We need a press release for our upcoming product launch: the 'EcoCharge Pro' fast‑charging battery pack. It's a joint announcement with GreenTech Partners. The launch event is virtual on February 5, 2025 at 10:00 AM PST. Include a quote from our CEO, Maya Rivera, and make sure we have an embargo until February 4, 2025, 5 PM GMT. Our corporate style guide is at https://example.com/styleguide.json.

messages.content:
{
  "title": "EcoCharge Pro Launch",
  "product": "EcoCharge Pro",
  "partner": "GreenTech Partners",
  "event_type": "Virtual Launch",
  "event_date": "2025-02-05",
  "event_time": "10:00 AM PST",
  "quote": "EcoCharge Pro represents a major step forward in sustainable power solutions, and we are thrilled to bring this technology to consumers worldwide," said Maya Rivera, CEO.
}
Great, I have the core details. Next I’ll fetch your company’s press‑release style guide.
Now I’ll generate SEO‑optimized keywords for the release.

arguments.topic: EcoCharge Pro fast charging battery pack sustainable power

messages.content: ["EcoCharge Pro","fast charging battery","sustainable power","green tech","portable charger","eco-friendly battery","GreenTech Partners","virtual product launch"]
I’ll now draft the press release, incorporating the embargo notice you requested (embargo until February 4, 2025, 5 PM GMT).

event_details.title: EcoCharge Pro Launch
event_details.quote: EcoCharge Pro represents a major step forward in sustainable power solutions, and we are thrilled to bring this technology to consumers worldwide," said Maya Rivera, CEO.

messages.content:
EMBARGOED UNTIL February 4, 2025, 5 PM GMT

EcoCharge Pro Launch

EcoCharge Technologies, in partnership with GreenTech Partners, is excited to announce the upcoming release of EcoCharge Pro, a fast‑charging, eco‑friendly battery pack designed for on‑the‑go professionals.

The virtual launch event will take place on February 5, 2025, at 10:00 AM PST. Attendees will receive a live demonstration of the product’s capabilities and an opportunity to ask questions.

“EcoCharge Pro represents a major step forward in sustainable power solutions, and we are thrilled to bring this technology to consumers worldwide,” — Maya Rivera, CEO.

EcoCharge Pro delivers up to 50% faster charging than competing devices while maintaining a carbon‑neutral manufacturing process. The product also incorporates advanced safety features and a sleek, compact design.

For media inquiries, please contact press@ecocharge.com.

For more information, visit https://example.com
The draft looks good. I’ll run a thorough proofread to catch any grammar, spelling, or brand‑tone issues.
